sense.def:
Contact
je srečevanje in sporazumevanje z nekom, največkrat redno.

seg.quote: There is little contact between governors and parents.
My first contact with him was about twenty-five years ago.

sense.def:
To contact someone
pomeni nekoga poklicati po telefonu ali mu pisati.

seg.quote: As soon as we find out, we'll contact you.

sense.def:
A contact
je človek, ki ga poznamo, na primer nekdo v organizaciji ali poklicu; ta nam pomaga ali daje informacije.

Contact
se nanaša tudi na to, da se predmeti dotikajo drug drugega.

seg.quote: Close physical contact is important for a baby.

sense.def:
To be in contact with someone
pomeni nekoga redno srečevati ali se z njim sporazumevati.

seg.quote: I'm in contact with a number of schools.

sense.def:
Kadar so predmeti
in contact
, se dotikajo drug drugega.

seg.quote: One foot must always be in contact with the ground.

sense.def:
To come into contact with someone
pomeni pri delu ali drugih dejavnostih po naključju nekoga srečati.

seg.quote: Everyone who came into contact with her liked her.

sense.def:
Če ena stvar
comes into contact with another
, se prva stvar dotika druge.

seg.quote: My hand came into contact with a small lump.

sense.def:
To make contact with someone
pomeni ugotoviti, kje je nekdo in govoriti z njim ali mu pisati.

To lose contact with someone
pomeni prenehati se srečevati z nekom ali mu pisati.
